title: Kiss of the Christmas Wind
description: A classic Christmas story by a beloved bestselling author, now in ebook for the first time! The western frontier. Deadly winter weather. New bride Carrie Sue Jamison wonders if she will be widowed before spending even one Christmas with her husband Thad, a Texas Ranger. He's left home to track a gang of murderous bank robbers through the wilderness.
author: Janelle Taylor
